label: no recurrence, disease-free
description: Patient became disease-free after treatment and has not had a recurrence; leukemia in remission.

label: in situ recurrence of invasive
description: In situ recurrence of an invasive tumor.

label: in situ recurrence of in situ
description: In situ recurrence of an in situ tumor.

label: local recurrence, NOS
description: Local recurrence and there is insufficient information available to code to 13-17. Recurrence is confined to the remnant of the organ of origin; to the organ of origin; to the anastomosis; or to scar tissue where the organ previously existed.

label: local recurrence of invasive
description: Local recurrence of an invasive tumor.

label: trocar recurrence of invasive
description: Trocar recurrence of an invasive tumor. Includes recurrence in the trocar path or entrance site following prior surgery.

label: local and trocar recurrence of invasive
description: Both local and trocar recurrence of an invasive tumor (both 13 and 14)

label: local recurrence of in situ
description: Local recurrence of an in situ tumor.

label: local and trocar recurrence of in situ
description: Both local and trocar recurrence of an in situ tumor.

label: regional recurrence, NOS
description: Regional recurrence, and there is insufficient information available to code to 21-27.

label: regional recurrence of invasive, adjacent tissue
description: Recurrence of an invasive tumor in adjacent tissue or organ(s) only.

label: regional recurrence of invasive, regional lymph nodes
description: Recurrence of an invasive tumor in regional lymph nodes only.

label: regional recurrence of invasive, adjacent tissue and regional lymph nodes
description: Recurrence of an invasive tumor in adjacent tissue or organ(s) and in regional lymph nodes (both 21 and 22) at the same time.

label: regional recurrence of in situ, NOS.
description: Regional recurrence of an in situ tumor, NOS.

label: regional recurrence of in situ, adjacent tissue and regional lymph nodes
description: Recurrence of an in situ tumor in adjacent tissue or organ(s) and in regional lymph nodes at the same time.

label: regional and local/trocar recurrence of invasive
description: Both regional recurrence of an invasive tumor in adjacent tissue or organ(s) and/or regional lymph nodes (20-25) and local and/or trocar recurrence (10, 13, 14, or 15).

label: regional and local/trocar recurrence of in situ
description: Both regional recurrence of anin situ tumor in adjacent tissue or organ(s) and/or regional lymph nodes (26 or 27) and local and/or trocar recurrence (16 or 17).

label: distant recurrence, NOS
description: Distant recurrence and there is insufficient information available to code to 46-62.

label: distant recurrence of in situ
description: Distant recurrence of an in situ tumor.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, peritoneum only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the peritoneum only. Peritoneum includes peritoneal surfaces of all structures within the abdominal cavity and/or positive ascitic fluid.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, lung only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the lung only. Lung includes the visceral pleura.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, pleura only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the pleura only. Pleura includes the pleural surface of all structures within the thoracic cavity and/or positive pleural fluid.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, liver only.
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the liver only.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, bone only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in bone only. This includes bones other than the primary site.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, CNS only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the CNS only. This includes the brain and spinal cord, but not the external eye.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, skin only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in the skin only. This includes skin other than the primary site.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, lymph node only
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in lymph node only. Refer to the staging scheme for a description of lymph nodes that are distant for a particular site.

label: distant recurrence of invasive, systemic only
description: Distant systemic recurrence of an invasive tumor only. This includes leukemia, bone marrow metastasis, carcinomatosis, and generalized disease.

label: single distant and local/trocar/regional recurrence of invasive
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in a single distant site (51-58) and local, trocar, and/or regional recurrence (10-15, 20-25, or 30).

label: multiple distant recurrence of invasive
description: Distant recurrence of an invasive tumor in multiple sites (recurrences that can be coded to more than one category 51-59).

label: never disease-free
description: Since diagnosis, patient has never been disease-free. This includes cases with distant metastasis at diagnosis, systemic disease, unknown primary, or minimal disease that is not treated.

label: recurrence, NOS
description: Disease has recurred, but the type of recurrence is unknown.

label: unknown
description: It is unknown whether the disease has recurred or if the patient was ever disease-free.
